summary: Energy is returning after a long low. Not sure if it's meds or cycle, but it's rising—need to watch ceiling. Able to work again, finished Firebase CMS mostly (realized I had already done bulk earlier). Mental cohesion coming back. Office had a slight patch with manager, but didn't spiral. Work’s on track. Tutor app looks real—maybe even profitable—but not attaching to that yet. Feeling better, not manic, just stable with mild hope.

wins: Firebase CMS is almost done—just needed reconnection of old work
Handled minor manager tension without emotional reaction
losses: Mild risk of overinterpreting hope as signal—monitor mood over next 3 days
ideas: Track energy trend post-med change for 7-day window before inferring causality

goals: Polish Tutor App for demo-ready state
Keep mental ceiling in check while maintaining output
